meanings.definition: The behavior or actions characteristic of a blackguard.
meanings.sent1: His blackguardism was evident in the way he treated others with disrespect.
meanings.sent2: The town was tired of the constant blackguardism displayed by the troublemakers.
meanings.sent3: Despite his blackguardism, he somehow managed to charm his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The blackguardism of the bullies cast a dark shadow over the school.
meanings.sent5: The blackguardism of the villain made him a truly despicable character in the story.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a blackguard.
meanings.sent1: She was appalled by the blackguardism of his behavior at the party.
meanings.sent2: The blackguardism of his actions left a stain on his reputation.
meanings.sent3: Despite his charming facade, his blackguardism always shone through in the end.
meanings.sent4: The blackguardism of the criminal organization was finally exposed to the public.
meanings.sent5: The politician's blackguardism was revealed when his corrupt dealings came to light.
